name: vimtag
0:
”Alexa, show office.”
”Alexa,show my office camera.”
”Alexa, stop.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With this skill, you can view camera video using echo show or fire TV. If you want to view the camera video, you need to use the vimtag cloud camera and register your vimtag account to add your cloud camera to your vimtag account.Next, you need to associate this skill with your vimtag account. After completing the link between this skill and the vimtag account, you can say "Alexa, Discover Devices" to find your device. If your device list has a vimtag camera called "Office", you can say "Alexa, show my office camera" to watch the video of the camera.
